title: Gaining kernel code execution on an MTE-enabled Pixel 8
dot:
digraph CVE_2023_6241{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=filled, color=lightblue];subgraph cluster_vulnerability{label="CVE-2023-6241";color=lightgrey;node[color=lightcoral];Vulnerability[label="Vulnerability in Arm Mali GPU"];Discovery[label="Discovered on November 15, 2023"];Fix[label="Fixed in Arm Mali driver version r47p0
Released on December 14, 2023"];Impact[label="Allows malicious Android app to gain arbitrary kernel code execution"];Devices[label="Affects devices with newer Arm Mali GPUs
(e.g., Google's Pixel 7 and Pixel 8)"];}subgraph cluster_exploit{label="Exploitation";color=lightgrey;node[color=lightgreen];LogicBug[label="Logic bug in memory management unit"];BypassMTE[label="Bypasses Memory Tagging Extension (MTE)"];ExploitMTE[label="Exploit works even with kernel MTE enabled"];KernelCodeExecution[label="Gain arbitrary kernel code execution
from untrusted user application"];}subgraph cluster_mte{label="Memory Tagging Extension (MTE)";color=lightgrey;node[color=lightyellow];MTEOverview[label="New mitigation against memory corruption"];HardwareSupport[label="Hardware implementation in Arm v8.5a"];TagCollision[label="Tag collision limitation"];SpectreLeak[label="Leak memory blocks using side-channel attacks"];}subgraph cluster_exploit_details{label="Exploit Details";color=lightgrey;node[color=lightsalmon];TriggerBug[label="Trigger the bug to create inconsistencies"];GPUFault[label="Use GPU fault handler to grow JIT region"];Inconsistency[label="Inconsistency between pages array and GPU mappings"];ShrinkRegion[label="Shrink JIT region to create unmapped gap"];IncorrectSkipping[label="Incorrect skipping in kbase_mmu_teardown_pgd_pages"];AccessFreedPages[label="Access freed backing pages"];ReplacePGD[label="Replace freed backing page as PGD of GPU context"];ArbitraryKernelAccess[label="Gain arbitrary kernel code execution"];}Vulnerability->Discovery;Vulnerability->Fix;Vulnerability->Impact;Vulnerability->Devices;LogicBug->BypassMTE;BypassMTE->ExploitMTE;ExploitMTE->KernelCodeExecution;MTEOverview->HardwareSupport;HardwareSupport->TagCollision;HardwareSupport->SpectreLeak;TriggerBug->Inconsistency;Inconsistency->GPUFault;GPUFault->ShrinkRegion;ShrinkRegion->IncorrectSkipping;IncorrectSkipping->AccessFreedPages;AccessFreedPages->ReplacePGD;ReplacePGD->ArbitraryKernelAccess;}
